## ShaderTechniqueParams interface

Special technique for user-defined shaders. See https://threejs.org/docs/\#api/harp-materials/ShaderMaterial for details.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ShaderTechniqueParams extends BaseTechniqueParams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [params](./harp-datasource-protocol.shadertechniqueparams.params.md) | [ShaderTechniqueMaterialParameters](./harp-datasource-protocol.shadertechniquematerialparameters.md) | Parameters for shader. See <code>THREE.ShaderMaterialParameters</code>. |
|  [primitive](./harp-datasource-protocol.shadertechniqueparams.primitive.md) | "point" \| "line" \| "segments" \| "mesh" | Type of primitive for the shader technique. Valid values are "point" \| "line" \| "segments" \| "mesh" |
|  [transparent](./harp-datasource-protocol.shadertechniqueparams.transparent.md) | boolean | Set to 'true' if line should appear transparent. Rendering transparent lines may come with a slight performance impact. See https://threejs.org/docs/\#api/en/materials/Material.transparent. |
